normalized: one month had passed since the washizu material co.
infiltration.
there was no sign that our true identities had been found out by the enemy.
we hadn't suddenly been surrounded by soldiers, or felt any suspicious probing eyes on us.
it wasn't impossible that we were being made to dance on the palm of their hand, but we were leading our school lives more or less quietly and uneventfully.
we hadn't encountered that rubber woman since then, either.

thinking that she may have slipped in among the teachers and students of seishuu academy, we were indirectly checking out the women in the school, recalling her body shape (which was our only clue), but such a nice body was nowhere to be seen.
if anything, shizuru-san's looked like it, but that would hardly be the answer.
at any rate, we still needed to sneak into that washizu material research facility.
while waiting for the firepower for that to arrive, i was working hard at gathering intelligence.
we were in that kind of situation now.
my mind had been restless from early morning on.

i had no ability to foresee the future, but after getting through some difficult situations, i had reached the point where something along the lines of taimanin intuition had started to kick into effect.
according to that intuition, something was going to happen that would completely change the situation up until today.
something not too desirable for me.
i had that sort of premonition.
as usual, i was refuelling with a large helping of curry, so that i would be all right no matter what happened, when morita said something like this.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama, did you hear?
that kamoshita guy from class 1 got recognized as a top achiever.

name: tatsurou
normalized: mm?
what's that?

name: morita
normalized: huh?
you don't even know something like that?!
it's a system where students who have been recognized for their outstanding grades get admitted into the scholarship course in the middle of the term.

name: tatsurou
normalized: they have that kind of thing?

before the infiltration, i had more or less memorized things like seishuu academy's history and curriculum (which was comprised of a general course, scholarship course, maid course and valet course), but i hadn't memorized things that seemed irrelevant to the mission.

name: morita
normalized: that's my dream!
i'm super jealous of that kamoshita guy～!
the elite building looks incredible!
haahh～～…
ignoring my question, morita was grumbling with a moony face.
he normally called them 「those jerks from the elite building」, but was it actually more complex than that?
as a student of seishuu academy, who would already appear to be elite from the outside, was he yearning to be even more elite within it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i don't understand that strange frame of mind very well…）
i was born as the son and heir to the prestigious stray blade style, so i was kind of an elite in the taimanin village.
however, the person who had suitable ability for that was not me, but rinko-nee, and it seemed she would become the 49th (and first female) head of the stray blade style family.
i thought that i had also gained in skill recently, but i still couldn't take full mastership away from rinko-nee, the acting head of the family.
she was on that level.
most of all, there was the super-elite yukikaze, who ranked closest to rinko-nee, and
hey!
are you doing well?!
right, right, i was always being spurred on like that.
so, far from yearning to be an elite――
hey, wait a second!

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yukikaze?!
i suddenly raised my head, and yukikaze really was there.

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou!
“hullo”♪
for some reason, she greeted me in english, and made an elated smile.
her face said 『you're surprised i'm here, right?
of course i was surprised.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that outfit…?!
it was a seishuu academy uniform.
had yukikaze also gone undercover as a student, like me?
no, wait――did this mean the “battle” specialist was yukikaze?

name: yukikaze
normalized: how is it?
it suits me, don't you think?
yukikaze said boastfully, and twirled around on the spot.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （whoa…）
her long hair (which was tied up with ribbons) and the hem of her skirt fluttered gently.
she was so pretty that i had my breath taken away.
no sooner had that happened than yukikaze knit her brows, brought her face towards me, grabbed my necktie, and

name: yukikaze
normalized: i'm asking, 『doesn't it suit me?

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yeah, it looks good on you.

name: yukikaze
normalized: cute?

name: tatsurou
normalized: of, of course.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thanks♪
i was made to say that, half by force, and yukikaze smiled.
well, that was fine, but――
this time, i brought my face towards yukikaze and lowered my voice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: did you transfer here?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: yup!
of course.
yukikaze answered, in a carefree manner.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you turn up only when it's time for “that”…
“that”, of course, referred to the force infiltration.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it's easier to work this way, don't you think?
unlike tatsurou, i passed the transfer exam through my own ability, after all♪

name: tatsurou
normalized: hey!
this girl really wasn't cut out for infiltrations.
i became flustered because of yukikaze, who had suddenly started saying something that sounded like i had cheated.
well, actually, i had passed the super-difficult entrance examination by making use of my ninja arts, so it was cheating, though.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah…
seeming to have realized her verbal gaffe, yukikaze shrugged her shoulders and said 『sorry』 just with her eyes.

name: yukikaze
normalized: this place is an elite prep school, so you can't transfer if you're not smart, right?
it's all someone like tatsurou can do to get in, isn't it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, i guess.
i do have a hard time just keeping up with lessons.
or rather, i couldn't keep up at all.
there was no need to, though.

name: yukikaze
normalized: thought so.
yukikaze giggled.
a man appeared from behind her.

name: middle-aged man
normalized: yukikaze-sama, prepare for your next class soon.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze-sama?
it was a plump, middle-aged man wearing a three-piece suit, who didn't fit in with the school cafeteria at all.
his clothing looked like that of the valet course, but surely he wasn't a student.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze?!
who is this person…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: well, umm…
unusually, yukikaze made a face which looked like she was at a loss to explain.
it also appeared that she was embarrassed about being called something like 『yukikaze-sama』.
and then, before she said anything, the middle-aged man bowed his head towards me.

name: middle-aged man
normalized: i am called inui.
i serve as yukikaze-sama's valet.

name: inui
normalized: ordinarily,a fellow student on the valet course would act as her servant, but at the time of yukikaze-sama's transfer, all the pupils on the valet course were attending to somebody.

name: inui
normalized: being an old boy here, i have been arranged to serve her.
i am pleased to make your acquaintance.

name: tatsurou
normalized: thank you.
you're very polite… mm?
so that means…
in seishuu academy, the strange people known as valets were only provided to the scholarship students.
was yukikaze on the scholarship course?!
the moment i was about to confirm that, morita, who had been stupefied, bent forward in surprise.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama!
you know a beautiful girl from the scholarship course?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
w, well…

name: morita
normalized: you never said a word about something like that!

name: yukikaze
normalized: aha, beautiful girl, you say?

name: tatsurou
normalized: w, well… i just happened to make her acquaintance at school…

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah, i just met tatsurou by chance♪
unable to say that she was my childhood friend and a fellow taimanin, i lied, and this time, yukikaze giggled and matched my story.

name: morita
normalized: yukikaze-chan, you say?!
i'm morita!
i'm always taking care of akiyama!
i love you!

name: yukikaze
normalized: all of a sudden?

name: morita
normalized: yeah, it's sudden.
this is love at first sight!

name: yukikaze
normalized: smooth-talker, huh?
still, i don't dislike that.

name: morita
normalized: really?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah.
i don't want to be your girlfriend, though♪

name: morita
normalized: guaah!
being told that by yukikaze with a smiling face, morita's ship had been sunk.
he was a stupid guy, as ever.
while watching that from the side, i recalled that yukikaze was bright, based on her exceptional grades.
even so, did she take the scholarship student exam specifically for the purpose of the infiltration mission?
going to the elite building would be easiest, but there was no doubt that she had put considerable hard work into it.
it appeared that the tests were carried out in each individual person's room, so it had been too hard for me, since i would need to cheat.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze's in the elite building, huh…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah, that.
elite building.
that's a pretty frank way of putting it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, i guess.
but if it's the elite building, i can't go see you.

name: yukikaze
normalized: looks like it.
i got too serious in the exam♪
yukikaze said, like it was nothing.
but that wasn't the case.

name: tatsurou
normalized: honestly… what an awful sense of defeat.

name: yukikaze
normalized: it's usual for tatsurou to lose to me, isn't it?

name: tatsurou
normalized: it has been mentioned.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ahaha, sorry♪
i laughed, while glaring at her, and yukikaze stuck out her tongue playfully.

name: tatsurou
normalized: so, how does the elite building feel?

name: yukikaze
normalized: i've only seen a little so far, but it's amazing!
yukikaze opened her eyes wide, and spread both hands far out.

name: yukikaze
normalized: the building is huge, like the mansion of a noble from england or someplace, and i was given a really big, luxurious single room.
the bed's really soft and comfy, too.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that good, huh?

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah, it's like it's not a school at all!
yukikaze said delightedly, but then she lowered her voice a little.

name: yukikaze
normalized: but i'm a little sick of this aristocratic, or should i say, kinda self-important society.
those seemed to be her true feelings.
still, that was typical of yukikaze.
she wasn't the type who could keep quiet if she were mixed in with real ojou-samas.

name: inui
normalized: yukikaze-sama, i will be reprimanded if something happens to make you late, so…
inui, the middle-aged man who (true to his name) was waiting next to yukikaze like a dog, suddenly interjected.
(tl: the “inu” in his name is 犬, the word for dog.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （what's with this guy…?
i was a little annoyed to have my conversation with yukikaze impeded.
we had only just met, but even if he was a valet or whatever, it got on my nerves that a middle-aged man like this was at yukikaze's side.
well, if it were a young man the same age as me, it would be even more disagreeable, wouldn't it?
still, a middle-aged man like this, with yukikaze… hmm…
it seemed that that awkward feeling had come out on my face, and yukikaze giggled a little.

name: yukikaze
normalized: you're not jealous?

name: tatsurou
normalized: th, that's not especially…

name: yukikaze
normalized: especially what?
『i see through tatsurou's feelings♪
yukikaze poked my forehead, like she wanted to say that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well then, inui-san, let's go back.
yukikaze said that alone, in an ojou-sama-like way, then turned on her heel.
and then, when she was leaving, she whispered into my ear.

name: yukikaze
normalized: did you hear from shizuru-san?
strategy meeting, first thing tonight.

name: yukikaze
normalized: at shizuru-san's place, okay?
i'm glad i could see you!

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yeah, me too…

name: yukikaze
normalized: uh-hmm.
yukikaze left.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （guuh…）
even my joy over having been able to reunite with yukikaze was brief.
when shizuru-san's name left her mouth, i descended into self-loathing.
that sort of thing with shizuru-san, even though i had yukikaze.
even though i had decided that yukikaze would be my first partner.
it was terrifying just to imagine what would happen if my relationship with shizuru-san became known to yukikaze.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i have to do something about shizuru-san…）
